# TASK::TASK_STAND_STILL

## Summary
Gives the stand still task to a ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** time

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Makes the specified ped stand still for (time) milliseconds.
